description: Canonical machine-readable definitions for core governance metrics and constraints, ensuring consistency across MEE (L6), PVLM (L1), SCI (L3), and VMO (L7).

S-01_Efficacy.definition: Systemic Benefit/Value metric; computation derived from economic modeling layer.

S-02_Risk.definition: Systemic Risk/Cost metric; derived from simulated fault injection and impact modeling.

C-01_StructuralCostIndex.definition: The quantified long-term structural burden (memory, compute, maintenance) associated with the SST.

S-03_VetoSignal.trigger: Boolean: TRUE upon critical policy violation or integrity breach.
